title: La Vie de Chateau = the Good Life
creator_credit: Nicole Stephane, Ancinex, Cobela Films, La Gueville and Jean-Paul Rappeneau
brief_description: Catherine Deneuve plays a young woman married to a penniless lord of the manor in Normandy, during the war. In this light hearted comedy, life is rather dull until the English land, and then everything changes.
